title: Electronic Medical Records (EMR) System
summary: Comprehensive cloud-native EMR system for complete patient record management, clinical documentation, and care coordination.
description:
Comprehensive cloud-native EMR system designed to digitize and manage complete patient medical records, enabling healthcare providers to deliver efficient, coordinated care. The system supports clinical documentation, medication management, orders and results tracking, vitals monitoring, and patient portal access. Built with interoperability standards (HL7, FHIR) and HIPAA compliance to ensure secure, seamless data exchange across care settings.

## Technical Architecture Components

- Cloud-native database (PostgreSQL with partitioning)
- Document storage (S3-compatible object storage)
- Search engine (Elasticsearch for full-text search)
- HL7/FHIR integration engine
- Audit logging service (immutable ledger)
- IoT device gateway (MQTT/CoAP)

## Implementation Timeline

**Week 1:**
- Chart digitization (professional scanning)

**Week 2:**
- Cloud migration and data import

**Week 3:**
- Data verification and validation

**Week 4:**
- Go-live with staff training

## Case Study Reference

**Family Practice, Seattle**

- **Challenge:** 15,000 paper charts, slow retrieval
- **Outcome:** 100% digital in 3 weeks, retrieval time: 5 minutes â†’ 5 seconds
